13.XuYouyu (1999,180)has already observed that as themovement pro-
gressed throughout China,eachfaction appeared increasingly motivated prima-
rily to avoid having the other side take revenge on it if it were defeated: “To say
that they were pursuing group interests is less accurate than saying that their
behavior was defensivein nature."
